A special pre-release version of '''[[Beta 1.6]]''' was privately given to [https://youtube.com/c/hatfilms ''Hat Films''] for the creation of the official [[Minecraft 1.6 trailer|Beta 1.6 trailer]].<ref>{{ytl|oTxrGZGfNJs|Minecraft 1.6 trailer|Minecraft|May 24, 2011}}</ref> The client is not archived, but the server is due to Dinnerbone revealing the server file.</onlyinclude>
